text: There are eight cases in this data set for which the original sequence and structure were shortened to accommodate restrictions in length . We removed them from our data set , resulting in a set of size 425 . From now on we use " HK - PK " to refer to the pseudoknotted structures in this set ( with 88 structures ) and " HK - PKfree " to refer to the pseudoknot - free structures in this set ( with 337 structures ) . RNA sequences in HK - PK and HK - PK - free have length between 10 and 400 nucleotides .
